main.description: Update configuration for an enabled aggregator. Updates the authorization record's config field. Requires moderator permissions.

community.description: DID or handle of the community

config.description: New aggregator-specific configuration. Must conform to the aggregator's configSchema.

uri.description: AT-URI of the updated authorization record

cid.description: CID of the updated authorization record

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.description: Caller is not a moderator of this community

errors.name: AuthorizationNotFound
errors.description: Aggregator is not enabled for this community

errors.name: InvalidConfig
errors.description: Config does not match aggregator's configSchema
